text: HRq <rcfly <THT wrfeaut T4 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (M &Aat; 7es 4Rav7T &r TToTATf +ATT4) IFax 91-11-25093507 25093514 HT 7 National Highways Authority of India QaA_ IExtn;: 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping; Road Transport and Highways) 1-5 Wa 6, 7727-10 , ERa; 7 faai-110 075 G-5 & 6,Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.NHAI/ CMC/IE/ 2011 Date: 05.07.2011 POLICY MATTER TECH (82/2011) Sub: Standard Sub-Criteria_for evaluation of_RFP proposal for_Appointment of Independent Engineer for DBFOT Prgjects_of NHAL Competent Authority has approved the enclosed Standard Sub-Criteria for evaluation of RFP proposal for Appointment of Independent Engineer for DBFOT Projects of NHAI for adoption by all Technical Divisions of NHAI with immediate effect: Check-list for seeking approval from Competent Authority for inviting RFP is also enclosed: This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: ( Qe (R.B.Sinha) General Manager(CMC) Encl: As above To AII CGM(T)s/ GM(T)s/ DGM(T)s / Manager(TJs in HQ for information to: PS to Chairman/PS to Members Librarian #4A T % NHAL Copy
